titleStmt.title: The petition of his Excellency Thomas Lord Fairfax, Lord General and his Councel of officers, for the recalling of all penal laws made against private meetings, the punishing of prophanness, as swearing, &c. the releasing of persons under restraint, and the taking away unnecessary laws with their intricacies and delays. Presented to the Parliament on Thursday, August 16. 1649. With their answer thereunto.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Playford, and are to be sold at his shop in the Inner Temple,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
